channel.title: Java errors?
channel.description:
ok so i need help
when i try to start moparscape i get the red x in the corner of the screen but i also get this java error
GENERAL EXCEPTION
java.lang.noclassfoundexception :appletbot
description:
load: class AppletBot not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: AppletBot at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed. at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 10 more
so i uninstalled and re-installed jdk and jre like 10 times......i have jre 5.0 update 12 and jdk 6u2
i also serched up applet bot......nothing came up.......restarted my computer and nothing happened..and mozzila firefox makes absolutly no difference cuz i tried that to..........-.- what do i do?

item.title: Java errors?
item.dc:creator: @uu83r_pwn4g3 uu83r pwn4g3
item.description:
@uu83r_pwn4g3 wrote:

ok so i need help

when i try to start moparscape i get the red x in the corner of the screen but i also get this java error

GENERAL EXCEPTION

java.lang.noclassfoundexception :appletbot

description:

load: class AppletBot not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: AppletBot
at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed.
at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source)
at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
… 10 more

so i uninstalled and re-installed jdk and jre like 10 times…i have jre 5.0 update 12 and jdk 6u2

i also serched up applet bot…nothing came up…restarted my computer and nothing happened…and mozzila firefox makes absolutly no difference cuz i tried that to…-.- what do i do?
